ComicInfo.Title: Behold, A Flaming Star!
ComicInfo.Summary: Behold, A Flaming Star!: Night Rider is given the sacred spirit stone (which gives the wearer tremendous strength) by Flaming Star. On his way home Night Rider is shot by Towering Oak (the son of Flaming Star), who steals the stone. Towering Oak tries to take over his tribe, but is forced to fight the Night Rider in a trial by combat. Night Rider wins when Towering Oak's heart gives out from the strain of the stone. Flaming Star decides to bury the stone rather than give it back to Night Rider.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
